summary: Jason Scott Dolley was born in July 5, 1991. He is an American actor who was in Hatching Pete and Good Luck Charlie.
full_text: Jason Scott Dolley  is an American actor and musician, best known for his roles in various Disney Channel projects. These include Newton "Newt" Livingston III on Cory in the House, Virgil Fox in Minutemen, Connor Kennedy in Read It and Weep, Pete Ivey in Hatching Pete, and PJ Duncan on Good Luck Charlie.
title: Jason Dolley
